Judul: Analisis Pengaruh Inflasi Dan Suku Bunga Terhadap Return On A et Perusahaan Tekstil Dan Garmen Yang Terdaftar Di Bursa Efek Indonesia Periode 2016-2020
Abstrak: abstrak laku investasi investor milik harap oleh untung masa datang karena investor butuh bagai jenis informasi evaluasi kerja usaha perlu ambil putus laku investasi evaluasi kerja suatu usaha laku analis lapor uang lalu rasio uang return on a et tahun return on a et usaha teksil garmen alami turun signifikan turun return on a et salah satu dapat pengaruh faktor eksternal inflasi suku bunga teliti tuju uji pengaruh inflasi suku bunga return on a et usaha simultan parsial objek guna teliti usaha sub sektor tekstil garmen daftar bursa efek indonesia bei periode data guna teliti yaitu oleh lapor uang masing masing usaha teknik ambil sampel teliti yaitu guna purposive sampling teliti guna metode teliti kuantitatif menganalisa data teliti guna statistik deskriptif analisis regresi data panel guna uji f uji simultan uji t uji parsial uji hipotesis dasar hasil olah data teliti tunjuk variabel inflasi suku bunga pengaruh signifikan return on a et simultan parsial inflasi pengaruh signifikan return on a et suku bunga pengaruh signifikan return on a et hasil teliti dapat jadi bahan refrensi teliti lanjut juga informasi investor calon investor maupun usaha perhati faktor suku bunga inflasi ambil putus pada teliti temu fakta inflasi suku bunga rentan return on a et usaha

Judul: Ddos Attack Detection System Using Neural Network On Internet Of Things
Penulis: Lulus Wahyu Prasetya Adi, Satria Mandala, Yudhistira Nugraha
Abstrak: distributed denial of service ddos is an attack launched over a computer network to make the server unable to provide services to users ddos is also effectively used to stop services on internet of things systems based on the me age queuing telemetry transport mqtt protocol in the system attackers usually attack brokers who are used to manage data traffic between the i uer and the customer several research projects have been undertaken to detect ddos in the internet of things iot using machine learning however existing research projects still generally have low detection accuracy in predicting ddos this study provides a solution to the above problems by proposing the development of a machine learning model based on neural network nn to detect ddos furthermore this study also compared the results of nn predictions with k nearest neighbor knn the methods used in this study are as follows conducting literature studies develop both machine learning models conduct analysis rigorous experiments have been carried out using dataset derived from research and dataset generated through ddos simulations in iot environments by using the dataset generated through simulation the results obtained showed that the accuracy of nn is better than knn which is and respectively

Judul: Influence Of Liquidity, Company Age, And Risk Minimization On Corporate Social Responsibility Disclosure (Empirical Study On Mining Companies Listed On The Indonesia Stock Exchange 2015-2020)
Penulis: Rifky Satria Nadifa, Willy Sri Yuliandhari

Judul: Pengaruh Hubungan Ukuran Dewan Direksi Terhadap Return Saham Dengan Reputasi Perusahaan Sebagai Variabel Mediasi (Perusahaan Indeks Lq45 Tahun 2016 - 2020)
Abstrak: usaha indeks lq kumpul daftar usaha liquid pasar modal fundamental baik kerja uang baik return saham janji wakil pasar modal seleksi kriteria nilai pasar likuiditas tinggi karena maka kondisi usaha baik kerja maupun uang usaha jaga stabil kondisi return saham arah tingkat return saham rupa nilai dua komponen capital gain dividend tuju laku teliti tahu pengaruh reputasi usaha mediasi hubung ukur dewan direksi return saham usaha daftar indeks lq tahun metode guna metode kuantitatif data ambil sekunder populasi teliti usaha daftar indeks lq tahun sampel ambil guna teknik purposive sampling dapat banyak sampel metode analisis guna adalah analisis jalur guna sp  alat uji statistic hipotesis hasil dapat teliti yaitu variabel ukur dewan direksi reputasi usaha sama sama simultan cara parsial ada pengaruh signifikan return saham varibel reputasi usaha mampu mediasi hubung ukur dewan direksi return saham saran teliti lanjut untuk tambah variabel beda variabel mekanisme reaksi investor dewan komisaris komite audit ubah indikator dewan direksi proporsi direktur wanita jumlah direktur asing karakteristik latar belakang didik kata kunci return saham ukur dewan direksi reputasi usaha the lq index company is a collection of lists of liquid companies in the capital market with the best fundamentals and the best financial performance with promising stock returns and representing the capital market with selection criteria such as market value and high liquidity therefore the condition of the company both performance and company finances must be maintained in order to stabilize the condition of stock returns which leads to an increase stock return is the value of two components namely capital gains and dividends the purpose of this study was to determine the effect of company reputation mediating the relationship between the size of the board of directors and stock returns in companies listed on the lq index in the method used is a quantitative method with the data taken is secondary the population in this study were companies listed on the lq index in the sample was taken using purposive sampling technique and obtained as many as samples the analytical method used is path analysis using sp  as a statistical and hypothesis test tool the results obtained from this study show that the variable size of the board and the company s reputation at the same time do not have a significant effect on stock returns and that the variable company s reputation cannot mediate the relationship between board size and stock returns suggestions for further researchers are to add different variables such as the reaction mechanism of investors the board of commi ioners and the audit committee and to change the indicators of the board of directors such as the proportion of female directors the number of foreign directors and characteristics of educational background

Judul: Pengaruh Kualitas Hubungan Terhadap Loyalitas Pelanggan Wifi.Id Di Kota Bandung Dengan Pemuliham Layanan Sebagai Variabel Intervening
Abstrak: tahun kembang teknologi makin kembang sangat pesat salah satu industry besar sangat butuh industri telekomunikasi industri layan internet rupa industri sangat butuh saat hampir semua kalang indonesia jasa sedia layan internet besar kenal ialah wifi id ada bawah naung telkom indonesia sebab wifi id bisa menganalisa perilaku langgan karna wifi id meruapakan salah satu aset milik telkom indonesia tidak langsung jaga loyalitas langgan nya karna rupa salah satu layan sedia jasa internet sudah sebar bagai penjuru indonesia wifi id perlu perhati kualitas hubung langgan nya juga tanggap pulih layan bila kendala ganggu langgan cipta loyalitas langgan adapun saran tulis ikan usaha adalah usaha perlu baik hal puas komitmen variabel kualitas hubung untuk teliti lanjut saran dapat laku teliti studi usaha lain temu hasil beda jika usaha jenis dapat cakup lebih luas guna pada teliti ini hanya cakup guna kota bandung

Judul: Pengaruh Likuiditas, Leverage, Profitabilitas Dan Opini Audit Terhadap Nilai Perusahaan (Studi Empiris: Perusahaan Manufaktur Yang Terdaftar Di Bursa Efek Indonesia Periode 2018-2020)
Abstrak: nilai usaha bentuk lalu indikator nilai pasar saham pengaruh peluang peluang investasi nilai usaha buat investor kreditur makin selektif investasi maupun beri kredit usaha makin tinggi nilai usaha makin tinggi tingkat kembali investor teliti tuju uji pengaruh likuiditas leverage profitabilitas opini audit nilai usaha usaha manufaktur daftar bursa efek indonesia bei periode teliti guna metode teliti kuantitatif lihat hubung variabel objek teliti populasi teliti banyak usaha periode tahun data jadi sampel teliti banyak usaha di observasi teknik analisis guna regresi data panel hasil teliti tunjuk likuiditas leverage profitabilitas opini audit simultan pengaruh nilai usaha parsial profitabilitas opini audit pengaruh nilai usaha likuiditas leverage pengaruh nilai usaha

Judul: Pengaruh Pertumbuhan Perusahaan, Free Cash Flow, Dan Investment Opportunity Set Terhadap Nilai Perusahaan (Studi Perusahaan Manufaktur Sektor Industri Barang Konsumsi Yang Terdaftar Pada Bursa Efek Indonesia Tahun 2016-2020)
Abstrak: nilai usaha lihat harga saham rupa gambar kerja usaha cermin respon investor makin tinggi nilai usaha investor akan makin merespon positif teliti tuju uji pengaruh simultan parsial tumbuh usaha free cash flow investment opportunity set nilai usaha usaha manufaktur sektor industri barang konsumsi daftar bursa efek indonesia tahun teknik guna teliti adalah purposive sampling dasar purposive sampling oleh sampel usaha metode analisis data teliti adalah regresi data panel guna software eviews hasil teliti tunjuk tumbuh usaha growth free cash flow fcf investment opportunity set mvbva pengaruh simultan nilai usaha variabel tumbuh usaha investment opportunity set parsial pengaruh signifikan arah positif nilai usaha variabel free cash flow pengaruh signifikan nilai usaha usaha manufaktur sektor industri barang konsumsi daftar bursa efek indonesia bei tahun

Judul: Pengaruh Profitabilitas, Leverage, Good Corporate Governance Terhadap Manajemen Laba (Studi Pada Perusahaan Sub Sektor Makanan-Minuman Yang Terdaftar Di Bursa Efek Indonesia Tahun 2017-2020)
Abstrak: abstrak manajemen laba rupa suatu tindak nilai lapor uang siap buah transaksi tuju manipulasi kerja uang penting manajemen laku manipulasi tambah maupun kurang nilai dapat dapat lapor uang guna suatu cara akuntansi guna usaha ada campur tangan susun lapor uang teliti tuju tahu bagaimana pengaruh profitabilitas leverage good corporate governance manajemen laba usaha sub sektor makan minum daftar bursa efek indonesia tahun teliti guna data lapor uang daftar bursa efek indonesia bei populasi teliti adalah usaha sub sektor makan minum daftar bursa efek indonesia bei tahun teknik pilih sampel guna purposive sampling oleh usaha periode teliti tahun oleh total sampel teliti metode analisis data guna teliti adalah analisis regresi data panel hasil teliti ini tunjuk profitabilitas leverage good corporate governance pengaruh simultan manajemen laba parsial variabel profitabilitas pengaruh positif manajemen laba leverage good corporate governance diri variabel milik institusional komisaris independen pengaruh manajemen laba kata kunci good corporate governance leverage manajemen laba profitabilitas

Judul: Pengaruh Risk Minimization, Gender Diversity Dan  Sertifikasi Lingkungan Terhadap Pengungkapan Corporate  Social Rensponsibility  (Studi Kasus Pada Industri Primer Yang Terdaftar Di Bursa Efek Indonesia Tahun 2019- 2021)
Penulis: Aulia Fatiha Kurniadi, Wahdan Arum Inawati
Abstrak: corporate social rensponsibility rupa bentuk pertanggungjawaban usaha para pegang saham perhati aspek sosial aspek lingkung ada sekitar tempat aktivitas operasional usaha laksana risk minimization rupa upaya laku usaha meminimalisir risiko akan jadi aktivitas operasional usaha gender diversity proporsi perempuan dewan direksi usaha sertifikasi lingkung rupa bagi sistem manajemen perusahaaan guna kembang terap bijak kena lingkung juga pandu usaha kelola aspek lingkung teliti tuju tahu pengaruh risk minimization gender diversity sertifikasi lingkung ungkap corporate social rensponsibility simultan maupun parsial populasi teliti adalah usaha industri primer daftar bursa efek indonesia bei tahun pilih sampel guna metode purposive sampling sampel oleh banyak usaha observasi analisis guna teliti adalah analisis deskriptif analisis regresi data panel guna eviews hasil teliti tunjuk risk minimization gender diversity sertifikasi lingkung pengaruh simultan corporate social rensponsibility sial risk minimization pengaruh positif corporate social rensponsibility gender diversity sertifikasi lingkung corporate social rensponsibility

Judul: Pengaruh Shareholder Pre ure, Auditor Type Dan Director Expertise Terhadap Kualitas Sustainability Report (Studi Pada Seluruh Perusahaan Yang Terdaftar Di Bursa Efek Indonesia Periode 2018-2020)
Abstrak: sustainability report alat sarana usaha lapor komunikasi aspek lingkung ekonomi sosial pera stakeholder nya lapor terbit usaha harus kualitas salah satu sustainability report kualitas sustainability report gambar usaha tanggung jawab bantu stakeholder paham ambil putus nyata banyak usaha kurang maksimal manfaat lapor sustainability report kualitas sebab bagai macam faktor khusus seluruh usaha daftar bursa efek indonesia tahun hingga tuju teliti adalah tahu analis pengaruh stakeholder pre ure auditor type auditor expertise kualitas sustainability report guna gri standard populasi teliti adalah seluruh usaha daftar bursa efek indonesia periode pilih sampel teliti guna teknik purposive sampling sampel teliti jumlah data observasi metode analisis data teliti adalah analisis regresi data panel guna software eviews hasil uji tunjuk stakeholder pre ure auditor type director expertise pengaruh simultan kualitas sustainability report parsial stakeholder pre ure pengaruh kualitas sustainability report auditor type pengaruh negative kualitas sustainability report director expertise pengaruh

Judul: Pengaruh Social Media Marketing Terhadap Destination Image Dan Intention To Visit Bali Zoo
Abstrak: teknologi dewasa kembang pesat lihat mahir gawai beri mudah akses internet para guna khusus jelajah media sosial iring jalan waktu peran internet mulai alih kembang destinasi wisata sosial media jadi sarana pasar industri pariwisata bal zoo rupa salah satu destinasi wisata manfaat media sosial pasar produk bal zoo upaya komunikasi pasar cukup aktif media sosial khusnya instagram bal zoo tahun tahun milik jumlah unjung lebih rendah banding saing bal safari and marine park karena teliti tuju eksplorasi pengaruh social media marketing intention to visit ikut akun instagram bal zoo mediasi variabel destination image tahu dapat pengaruh variabel social media marketing variabel intention to visit bal zoo pengaruh variabel social media marketing variabel destination image di bal zoo pengaruh variabel destination image variabel intention to visit bal zoo teliti rupa teliti kuantitatif jenis teliti guna teliti jelas explanation research populasi teliti adalah followers akun instagram bal zoo jumlah followers hitung tanggal november sampel guna teliti besar responden guna purposive sampling teknik ambil sampel adapun teknik analisis data guna uji asumsi klasik analisis jalur uji koefisien determinasi uji sobel uji hipotesis hasil teliti tunjuk social media marketing milik pengaruh positif sigifikan intention to visit social media marketing milik pengaruh positif sigifikan destination image destination image milik pengaruh positif sigifikan intention to visit destination image pengaruh positif peran mediasi signifikan social media marketing intention to visit bal zoo dasar simpul hasil teliti telah laku baik bal zoo perlu tingkat kualitas informasi bagi akun instagram tingkat layan baik kesan wisatawan mulai wisatawan kunjung bal zoo hingga beri feedback lebih giat ada aktivitas komunikasi pasar aktif interaksi followers media sosial tawar promo hari hari tentu

Judul: Pengaruh Ukuran Perusahaan, Pertumbuhan Aset Dan Tangibility Terhadap Struktur Modal (Studi Empiris Perusahaan Property, Real, Dan Estate Yang Terdaftar Di Bursa Efek Indonesia Tahun 2016-2020)
Abstrak: struktur modal jadi faktor penting nilai kerja usaha struktur modal pengaruh kondisi uang harga saham usaha struktur modal usaha rupa kombinasi saham biasa preferen campur semua sumber anggar kombinasi sumber dana diri hutang saham hasil nilai hasil tinggi usaha sebut struktur modal optimal struktur modal ukur rasio banding total utang modal sendiri biasa sebut debt to equity ratio der der tunjuk tingkat risiko suatu usaha makin tinggi rasio der akan makin tinggi risiko akan jadi usaha dana usaha unsur utang lebih besar modal sendiri teliti tuju tahu pengaruh ukur usaha tumbuh aset tangibility struktur modal simultan parsial usaha sektor property real estate daftar bursa efek indonesia tahun metode terap teliti kuantitatif sumber data asal lapor tahun usaha annual report publikasi lalu bursa efek indonesia website resmi usaha teknik ambil sampel guna yaitu purposive sampling teliti oleh sampel banyak usaha observasi lama lima tahun total seluruh sampel banyak usaha analisis data guna teliti adalah model analisis regresi data panel dasar hasil teliti usaha kelola total aset maksimal mungkin dapat kontrol jumlah hutang usaha jaga jumlah tingkat hutang tidak terlalu tinggi antisipasi ada financial distre

Judul: Prediksi Financial Distre  Menggunakan Model Z-Score Dan Support Vector Machine Pada Perusahaan Sektor Infrastruktur, Utilitas, Dan Transportasi Yang Terdaftar Di Bursa Efek Indonesia Tahun 2017-2020
Abstrak: financial distre  rupa tahap awal turun kondisi uang usaha jadi bangkrut likuidasi usaha milik mungkin sama hadap sulit uang teliti tuju prediksi financial distre  guna metode altman z score support vector machine usaha infrastruktur utilitas transportasi daftar bei periode z score suatu model prediksi sulit uang guna rasio uang kembang altman support vector machine kerja maksimal batas garis pisah hyperplane oleh ukur margin maksimal hyperplane pisah dua kelompok data ukur margin hyperplane metode guna teliti adalah teliti kuantitatif populasi teliti banyak usaha sektor infrastruktur utilitas transportasi tahun sampel teliti guna teknik purposive sampling oleh banyak usaha prediksi financial distre  guna data latih banyak usaha latih algoritma support vector machine hasil teliti tunjuk model prediksi altman z score prediksi usaha dapat status distre  lama empat tahun turut turut akurasi prediksi model support vector machine prediksi usaha alami distre  lama empat tahun turut turut akurasi besar dasar hasil uji hipotesis simpul dapat beda hasil prediksi model altman model svm

Judul: The Effect Of Job Satisfaction On Employees Performance At Pt Bpr Bkk Boyolali
Abstrak: in this era of post covid pandemic employees must be prepared to face existing problems or threats to improve their performance in working in their office as before covid these data indicate that there is a decrease in employee performance caused by several factors one of them is job satisfaction factor this research was conducted at the pt bpr bkk boyolali this study aims to determine the effect of job satisfaction in pt bpr bkk boyolali s employees and analyze the effectivene  of job satisfaction on employee performances at pt bpr bkk boyolali the factors tested in this study were the effect of job satisfaction as an exogenous variable while employee performance as an endogenous variable the type of research used in this study was quantitative research the data used in the form of numbers and using statistical analysis population in this research are the whole employee of pt bpr bkk boyolali that amount of employees analysis technique will be used are simple linear regre ion t test f test and coefficient determinant the results of simple linear regre ion test obtained the performance value of when satisfaction is not existing and each increase i satisfaction of the unit it will increase the performance of or for the test result of t test produce tcount ttable which obtained that the result where h is rejected so it concluded that job satisfaction factors have significant effect toward employees performance on pd bpr bkk boyolali then to found out how much influence does the job satisfaction have on employees performance can be determined by coefficient of determination value r the results are r is which is this means that job satisfaction factors have an influence towards employees performance of pd bpr bkk boyolali and the remaining percentage are influenced by others

Judul: The Effect Of Service Quality, Perceived Value And Trust In Grabfood On Customer Satisfaction
Abstrak: in this modern era the growth and development of technology play numerous roles in the lives of individuals the busine  community uses the growth and development of technology to advertise and market its products this study was conducted to determine the effect of service quality perceived value customer satisfaction and trust as a mediator on the use of grabfood services the purpose of this research is to find out and analyze how the service quality of grabfood how is the perceived value of grabfood benefits and how is customer satisfaction with grabfood and trust as a mediator for grabfood this study employs a quantitative approach along with descriptive causality research purposive sampling a non probability sampling technique was used in this study s sampling which included respondents overall descriptive analysis and pls sem are the methods of data analysis used the results showed that perceived value had a positive and significant effect on customer satisfaction while the quality of service has no positive and significant effect on customer satisfaction trust will also mediate the relationship between service quality perceived value and customer satisfaction based on the research results grabfood is expected to be able to fulfill what was promised and promoted to customers this is to increase the trust of grabfood customers because trust can have an influence on customer satisfaction the results of this study are expected to be used as a reference source in further research and it is recommended to add variables not examined in this study

Judul: The Influence Of Consumers Perceived Risk On Consumers Online Purchase Intention (Case Study On Shopee Consumers In Indonesia)
Abstrak: the e commerce industry in the world has experienced significant development especially in indonesia according to momentum works shopee is an e commerce platform that has an important role in the development of the e commerce industry in indonesia according to research by kantar and snapcart shopee is the e commerce with the largest average monthly transaction and the highest frequency of transactions in these transactions are closely related to online purchases that show consumer purchase intention every online purchase made by consumers will be faced with greater risks compared to making direct purchases this study aims to analyze the influence of consumers perceived risk which has dimensions namely financial product security time social and psychological on consumers online purchase intention at shopee as e commerce this type of research is descriptive with quantitative research methods this study uses data collection techniques by collecting online questionnaires that distributed through google forms the questionnaire in this study used a likert scale as a rating scale this study has a sample of respondents and the sampling technique used is non probability sampling with purposive sampling method this study uses multiple linear regre ion as a data analysis technique the results of this study indicate that financial social and psychological risks negatively affect consumers online purchase intentions while the remaining risks are not proven these six risks also simultaneously affect consumers online purchase intentions on shopee e commerce

Judul: The Influence Of Social Media Marketing Activities On Brand Equity And Customer Response On Somethinc
Penulis: Gusti Ayu Sisyena Ramanthy, Maya Ariyanti, Eva Nurhazizah
Abstrak: dunia media sosial media paling populer miliar orang guna media sosial sarana paling efektif bagi informasi hubung orang lihat marak guna skincare guna media sosial ambil usaha tingkat ekuitas merek jangkau para langgan lebih luas salah satu merek cantik lokal somethinc teliti tuju lihat berapa besar pengaruh signifikan aktivitas pasar media sosial laku merek somethinc ekuitas merek respon langgan teliti ini guna metode kuantitatif teknik kumpul data guna kuisioner olah guna pls sem lalu software smartpls jumlah responden teliti ini banyak responden dasar analisis deskriptif entertainment interaction trendine  customization perceived risk brand awarene  brand image e wow commitment ada kategori baik hasil smartpls tunjuk interaction trendine  customization perceived risk pengaruh positif signifikan sadar merek citra merek entertainment pengaruh positif signifikan citra merek entertainment pengaruh signifikan sadar merek saran merek somethinc terus ikut informasi baru industri cantik dapat terus beri kenal informasi baru kini produk langgan somethinc tiap media sosial saran teliti lebih lanjut harap guna kriteria sampel fokus usaha bidang sama dapat hasil jadi banding

Judul: The Influence Of Value Of The Good, Merits Of The Deal And Value Compared To The Payment Towards Purchase Intention
Penulis: Hadi Rayyan Gho an, ADHI PRASETIO
Abstrak: the development of music and technology makes it easy for listeners to hear music anywhere for example music can be heard through smartphone applications today one of the leading applications today is spotify compared to its competitors spotify has always been in the top position in the last five years therefore this research should be done to find out what factors make the purchase intention of a spotify application always increase so that spotify can continue to maintain these achievements and survive against technological developments a survey using a questionnaire was used in this study with members to people who had previously purchased spotify s premium features the analytical method used is sem with pls tools result show that over the five variable that propose towards app purchase intention only of them that proofed to had effect towards purchase intention based on the most influential that is monetary value of app app usefulne  and app enjoyment but all of the variable affect monetary value of app positively and significant in the end spotify needs to maintain monetary value of app app usefulne  and app enjoyment variables meanwhile to maintain and increase the monetary value of the app the app trialability app enjoyment app usefulne  and word of mouth variables are needed
